config.mod_enable.name: Enable Mod
config.mod_enable.tooltip: Toggle whether the mod affects tree rendering.
config.mod_enable_toggle_key.name: Mod Enable Toggle Key
config.mod_enable_toggle_key.tooltip: Shortcut key to toggle whether the mod is enabled.
config.render_tree_trunk.name: Render Tree Trunk
config.render_tree_trunk.tooltip: When unchecked, mature trees will be rendered as stumps.
config.render_leafy_shadow.name: Render Tree Shadows
config.render_leafy_shadow.tooltip: When unchecked, tree leaf shadows are only disabled when tree trunks are not rendered.
config.minish_oak.name: Oak Tree
config.minish_oak.tooltip: When checked, oak trees size will be minish.
config.minish_maple.name: Maple Tree
config.minish_maple.tooltip: When checked, maple trees size will be minish.
config.minish_pine.name: Pine Tree
config.minish_pine.tooltip: When checked, pine trees size will be minish.
config.minish_mahogany.name: Mahogany Tree
config.minish_mahogany.tooltip: When checked, mahogany trees size will be minish.
config.minish_green_rain_type1.name: Green Rain Type1 Tree
config.minish_green_rain_type1.tooltip: When checked, green rain type1 trees size will be minish.
config.minish_green_rain_type2.name: Green Rain Type2 Tree
config.minish_green_rain_type2.tooltip: When checked, green rain type2 trees size will be minish.
config.minish_green_rain_type3.name: Green Rain Type3 Tree
config.minish_green_rain_type3.tooltip: When checked, green rain type3 trees size will be minish.
config.minish_mystic.name: Mystic Tree
config.minish_mystic.tooltip: When checked, mystic trees size will be minish.
